apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the entire HTML or XML document. Conceptually, it is the root of the document tree, and provides the primary access to the document's data.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Since elements, text nodes, comments, processing instructions, etc. cannot exist outside the context of a Document, the Document interface also contains the factory methods needed to create these objects. The Node objects created have a ownerDocument attribute which associates them with the Document within whose context they were created.

example.pre: Document doc = docBuilder.newDocument(); Attr attr = doc.createAttribute("name");
Dim xmlDoc As New Msxml2.DOMDocument30 Dim newAtt As IXMLDOMAttribute Set newAtt = xmlDoc.createAttribute("name")
example.p: The example creates a document object and attribute object.
